programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi on otsustanud Santa Anas lõpuks tõepoolest kapi võita ja peab selleks ennast vaos hoidma. Rene markab laoboksis asjade virna, mis teda kõnetab. Kenny edastab oma vajadused universumile, samal ajal kui Barry puuab mangus pusida.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy veab Isaiah Victorvillei karistuseks, et ta on saanud hindeks kolmesid. Kenny tahab sisustada oma uut maja, kuid tema teel on kaheksa põhjust. Ja me ei taha kõlada imalalt, aga Lisa õpib palju.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Meteoriidi kokkupõrked muutsid meie maailma, luues inimtsivilisatsiooni jaoks ideaalse keskkonna ja kinkides hadavajalikke metalle. Kuid kas uued tõendid võivad paljastada, et taevaseid objekte on Maale suunanud intelligentsed tulnukad?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Kuigi kaasaegne teadus on peatanud paljud ohtlikud viirused ja bakterid, kasvab mure, et nakkusohtlikud mikroobid võivad liikuda labi surmava kosmose vaakumi. Kas Maa jargmine pandeemia tuleb teisest maailmast?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastakumneid on esitatud uskumatuid vaiteid maavaliste olendite viibimisest Maal ja valitsus on teinud palju tood, et neid umber lukata. Kas lahenemas on paev, mil vilepuhujaid võetakse lõpuks tõsiselt?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maailm on tais hammastavaid loodusnahtusi, mis on nii suurejoonelised ja kohati nii kummalised, et need ei vasta tavaparasele tarkusele. Kas teadus suudab selgitada Maa musteeriume? Või on inimese teadmised Maast vaid pinnapealsed?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Paljud meie planeedi mõistatused on siiani lahendamata. Kuidas moodustus Devils Toweri kalju? Või miks tabab valk mõnda inimest mitu korda? Kuigi mõned peavad neid vaid juhusteks, kas ei või need pigem viidata hoopis uuele arusaamale?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi on otsustanud Santa Anas lõpuks tõepoolest kapi võita ja peab selleks ennast vaos hoidma. Rene markab laoboksis asjade virna, mis teda kõnetab. Kenny edastab oma vajadused universumile, samal ajal kui Barry puuab mangus pusida.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui meeskond jõuab salaparase tunnelini aiakaigu all, kerkib esile uus põnev teaduslik teooria, mis viitab Nolani risti ja templiruutlite vahelisele seosele.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barry avastab vanaaegse GPS-susteemi ning Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad ainulaadse ulikonna. Dave Hester satub aga keerulisse olukorda.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrell Sheets satub selle sarja suurima leiu otsa. Jarrod ja Brandi uritavad olukorda parandada parast seda, kui on kaotanud natuke raha ja uhe tootaja.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrell Sheets paistab taas silma, kui teeb sarja kõige suurema tehingu. Mark Balelo ilmub valja koos kasitoona valminud meeste kotiga, mis on raha tais. Barry saab oma mootori kaima.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ainulaadsed leiud viivad poisid mõne hea muugini. Nad puuavad tõendada Titanicu filmi rekvisiite, Ton seisab maohammustuskomplekti muugi ajal vastamisi lõgismaoga ja Allen asub mootorsaagide mahalaadimise ajal jaaskulptuure tegema.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Poisid jaavad kinni laoboksi juurde, mida nad ei tahtnud, ja peavad sorteerima prugi, et jõuda oma lõpptulemuseni. Nad avastavad klaasipuhumisvahendid, autogrammidega pesapallid ja hokilitri heitja, mis paneb Toni tulejoonele.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Meteoriidi kokkupõrked muutsid meie maailma, luues inimtsivilisatsiooni jaoks ideaalse keskkonna ja kinkides hadavajalikke metalle. Kuid kas uued tõendid võivad paljastada, et taevaseid objekte on Maale suunanud intelligentsed tulnukad?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Aeg tiksub, kui muuja toob pandimajja Mr. T seinakella. Kas Rick ja Corey naevad kulda või haletsevad nad lolli? Chum ja Rick lahevad Texases fossiile otsima. Kuid kas nad suudavad tehingu valja kaevata või mattuvad tolmu alla?

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Oksjon Alleni vanal jahialal kaivitab malestused "uksiku hundina" luusimisest. Poisid leiavad komplekti RC võidusõidupaate ja kui nad ostavad meheliku laouksuse, mis on tais vana viskit, viib oine pidutsemine keerulise muugini.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Allen ei ole hommikukohvita vormis, kuid mõned lõbusad esemed aitavad tal energiat taastada. Poisid leiavad maadlusringi ja kui Allen avastab vanaaegsed mehaanilised kujud, tuletavad need talle meelde tema paevi lõbustuspargi paadikaptenina.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Paljud meie planeedi mõistatused on siiani lahendamata. Kuidas moodustus Devils Toweri kalju? Või miks tabab valk mõnda inimest mitu korda? Kuigi mõned peavad neid vaid juhusteks, kas ei või need pigem viidata hoopis uuele arusaamale?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Aeg tiksub, kui muuja toob pandimajja Mr. T seinakella. Kas Rick ja Corey naevad kulda või haletsevad nad lolli? Chum ja Rick lahevad Texases fossiile otsima. Kuid kas nad suudavad tehingu valja kaevata või mattuvad tolmu alla?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rene ja Casey leiavad Placentias asju tais hoiukapi, Barry ostab lao, mis paneb ta kahtlema oma kohas oksjonimangus ning Darrell avastab hambaarsti varustuse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrellil keelatakse uhest oksjonist osa võtta, Ivy võidab võitluse laheda masinaga ning Barry tegutseb salaja, aga kas ta saab ka sellega hakkama?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrell puuab tore sell olla ja lõpetab viimasena, Rene ja Casey teevad poe jaoks ideaalse ostu ning Barry usub, et skoorib, aga kas tal on õigus?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Santa Anas viibides võtab Lisa uhendust oma vanaemaga, puudes kasumit teenida. Brandi tegeleb kõige frustreerivama paevaga eales. Darrell uritab suupiste mõõtu boksist sooki teha ja Kenny valmistub tõelise salakavalusega hakkama saama.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lisa tuleb Montebellosse selge mõistusega, kavatsusega lasta laoboksidel endaga raakida. Ivy laseb oma pojal orienteeruda laoboksini, mis osutub mitte taiesti vabaks. Kenny on udini kohkunud sellest, mida ta oma boksist huljatult leiab.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barry toob kohale kitšikuninga Charles Phoenixi, et saada oksjonist paremat pilti. Darrell ei usu, et on olemas koduvaljaku eelis.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Endine vabamaadleja Ivy Calvin laheb tagasi ringi ning satub peagi silm-silma vastu Darrelliga. Jarrod ja Brandi teevad ostu ning kohtuvad uhe nohikuga.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.sub-title: Massaja, pealik, tema poeg ja vennad
programme.desc: Ostjad sõidavad kaugele Elsinorei jarve aarde Californias. Jarrod ja Brandi vaidlevad, Barry otsustab asjadesse mitte sekkuda ning Sheetsid leiavad midagi ebamaist.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tuhanded inimesed on teatanud UFOde nagemisest. Enamik neist kummalistest ja hairivatest juhtumitest leiab aset samades kohtades. Kas on võimalik, et maavalised kosmoselaevad kulastavad Maad korduvalt nn "UFO-de lemmikpaiku"?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick uritab New Yorgis teha tehingu haruldase tehnikavidina ostmiseks. Kas see magus tukk suudab Ricki ahvatleda või loobub ta sellest? Poodi jõuab muuja Stan Lee Funko Popi erivaljaandega. Kas Corey teeb supertehingu?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui meeskond jõuab salaparase tunnelini aiakaigu all, kerkib esile uus põnev teaduslik teooria, mis viitab Nolani risti ja templiruutlite vahelisele seosele.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Rohkem kui 50 riigis on dokumenteeritud ule 10 000 viljaringi moodustise, millest paljudel on omadusi, mis ei allu tavaparastele seletustele. Kas need on maavalise paritoluga? Ja kui jah, siis mis on nende eesmark?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastakumneid on esitatud uskumatuid vaiteid maavaliste olendite viibimisest Maal ja valitsus on teinud palju tood, et neid umber lukata. Kas lahenemas on paev, mil vilepuhujaid võetakse lõpuks tõsiselt?

programme.title: Ajaloo suurimad saladused
programme.desc: Salaparane kividest moodustis on Inglismaa maastikku kaunistanud juba mitutuhat aastat. Kuid tanaseni ei tea keegi, kuidas ja miks see rajati. Kas tanapaeva tehnoloogia suudab lõpuks selle saladused avada? Mis on Stonehengei tõeline eesmark?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrell leiab super kogumiseseme, Jarrod ja Brandi võivad parast ostu rikkaks saada ning Barry panustab enda vastu ja võidab.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad suunduvad ladude oksjonile Tustinisse, kus Jeff Jarred teeb uue isikliku kasumi rekordi, kui ostab viie dollari eest lao.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jeff Jarred ilmub uuesti pilti, kui ostjad suunduvad oksjonitele Muriettasse. Brandi ja Jarrod võtavad uhe lao parast suure riski ning sellel on põnev tagajarg.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Asjad muutuvad hirmutavaks, kui muuja saabub koos Stephen Kingi kirjaga. Kas palju tood ja vahe mangu teeb Coreyst igava poisi? Corey kiidab Harrisonide peretraditsioonile takka, kui saabub James Bondi plakat. Kas ta luurab tehingut?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Vennaskond avastab soo alt uue ehitise ja uue teooria kohaselt tegid viikingid templiruutlitega koostood, et aidata neil Oak Islandile jõuda.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maailm on tais hammastavaid loodusnahtusi, mis on nii suurejoonelised ja kohati nii kummalised, et need ei vasta tavaparasele tarkusele. Kas teadus suudab selgitada Maa musteeriume? Või on inimese teadmised Maast vaid pinnapealsed?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Enam kui 3000 aastat tagasi omistasid iidsed kreeklased oma suurimad saavutused sellistele jumalatele nagu Zeus, Apollo ja Poseidon. Kuid kas on võimalik, et need võimsad olendid Olumpose maelt olid tegelikult Maad vaisavad tulnukatest kulalised?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi on vaga huvitatud oma brandi laiendamisest San Bernardinos. Rene on kindel, et kõik tahavad teda katte saada. Dusty jahib laoboksi, mis on tolmusem kui ta ise. Kenny aga on omadega rabas.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lisa naaseb Moreno Valleysse, kus kõik algas, ja nostalgitseb oma laoboksi juures. Kenny tervitab klanni uut lapselast ja tahaks leida sobiva laoboksi. Dusty ja Lupe lisavad oma ostule pisut higi ja vaeva.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Maavalise Intelligentsi Uurimise Keskus defineerib "viienda astme lahikontakti" kui otsese inimkontakti ja suhtluse maavalise eluga. Kuid kas see klassifikatsioon muutub praktiliseks alles kauges tulevikus?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas kalamees jaadvustas kaadrid hiiglaslikust meremaost, keda tuntakse nime all "Caddy"? Kuidas seletatakse salaparaseid siniseid ja rohelisi vilkuvaid tulesid, mille tunnistajaks olid sajad inimesed 1951. a augustis Texase osariigis Lubbockis?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas erru lainud lennundusohvitser avastas NASA arhiveeritud paikesesatelliidi fotodel tõendeid intelligentsete anomaaliate või tehnosignatuuride kohta? Kas ruhm uurijaid avastas uhes Mehhiko koopas parimad tõendid maavalise kontakti kohta Maal?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada? Tulnukate erisaade
programme.desc: Kas USA valitsus on varjanud tõde tulnukate kohta? Kas hiljuti Kongressile esitatud UAP juhtumid on tõendiks, et UAP on ohuks riigi julgeolekule? Ajakirjanik Tony Harris hindab koos tiimiga mõjuvaid tõendeid.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tuhanded inimesed on teatanud UFOde nagemisest. Enamik neist kummalistest ja hairivatest juhtumitest leiab aset samades kohtades. Kas on võimalik, et maavalised kosmoselaevad kulastavad Maad korduvalt nn "UFO-de lemmikpaiku"?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas erru lainud lennundusohvitser avastas NASA arhiveeritud paikesesatelliidi fotodel tõendeid intelligentsete anomaaliate või tehnosignatuuride kohta? Kas ruhm uurijaid avastas uhes Mehhiko koopas parimad tõendid maavalise kontakti kohta Maal?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Asjad muutuvad hirmutavaks, kui muuja saabub koos Stephen Kingi kirjaga. Kas palju tood ja vahe mangu teeb Coreyst igava poisi? Corey kiidab Harrisonide peretraditsioonile takka, kui saabub James Bondi plakat. Kas ta luurab tehingut?

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Impeeriumi loomine
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Terry Schappert reveals why the Vikings were called the "Hells Angels of the Middle Ages". He tests the weapons and tactics used to pillage Europe. They pillage Europe, but they meet their match--the Saxons--at the Battle of Maldon.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Terry Schappert reveals why the Vikings were called the "Hells Angels of the Middle Ages". He tests the weapons and tactics used to pillage Europe. They pillage Europe, but they meet their match--the Saxons--at the Battle of Maldon.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Impeeriumi loomine
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: In an area of northwest Alaska, covering 300,000 square miles, over 20,000 people have mysteriously vanished. The majority of these disappearances have occurred in an area locals call the Alaska Triangle. Some people were lost to the rugged landscape, others disappeared by plane. But in all these cases, the bodies are rarely discovered. Who or whats behind these cases is unknown. Some believe its the work of local predators. Others point to legendary creatures like the Kushtaka, or the Iliamna Lake Monster. And some believe its a supernatural force called a vile vortex.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including JFKs actual brain tissue and millions of dollars of gold coins stolen from the U.S. Mint. Plus, a remarkable violin from the Titanic.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: When army manoeuvres shut down the teams journey to restore an ancient minaret, they take a treacherous journey through the White Desert to camp in an oasis. Zahi makes friends with the local Bedouins, who feed the starving group.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: 2012. Munchenis asuva, eakale erakule Cornelius Gurlittile kuuluva korteri labiotsimisel selgub, kuidas Gurlitti pooljuudist isa Hildebrand sõlmis tehingu saatanaga - temast sai Adolf Hitleri kunstikaupmees.

programme.title: Impeeriumi loomine
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Miks inimesed kõigist teistest Maa liikidest nii palju erinevad? Kas me arenesime ahvidest või on meie intelligents parit kontaktist maavalise allikaga?

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including JFKs actual brain tissue and millions of dollars of gold coins stolen from the U.S. Mint. Plus, a remarkable violin from the Titanic.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: When army manoeuvres shut down the teams journey to restore an ancient minaret, they take a treacherous journey through the White Desert to camp in an oasis. Zahi makes friends with the local Bedouins, who feed the starving group.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: 2012. Munchenis asuva, eakale erakule Cornelius Gurlittile kuuluva korteri labiotsimisel selgub, kuidas Gurlitti pooljuudist isa Hildebrand sõlmis tehingu saatanaga - temast sai Adolf Hitleri kunstikaupmees.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Maale kukkunud asteroid põhjustas 65 miljonit aastat tagasi dinosauruste valjasuremise. Mis siis saaks, kui sarnane kosmosekamakas kukuks taas samasse kohta? Kuidas inimkond sellele jargnevad looduskatastroofid ule elaks?

programme.title: Slash and Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators - Live At the Roxy
programme.desc: On September 25th 2014, shortly after the release of their "World On Fire" album, Slash with Myles Kennedy and The Conspirators took the stage at the legendary Roxy Theatre on Sunset Strip in West Hollywood. The atmospheric venue, steeped in rock history, gave fans a brilliant opportunity to experience the band up close as they delivered a set packed with more recent solo tracks, including several from the new album, and classics from Slashs earlier career with Guns n Roses and Velvet Revolver. The intimate setting inspired the band to deliver a scintillating, dynamic performance that is brilliantly captured on this digital release.

programme.title: Peter Gabriel - Peter Gabriel
programme.sub-title: Peter Gabriel: Growing Up Live In Italy
programme.desc: This concert film documents Peter Gabriels "Growing Up" tour stop at Milans FilaForum in May 2003.

programme.desc: The Apple Music Festival (formerly known as the iTunes Festival) was a music concert series held by Apple, Inc. inaugurated in 2007.

programme.title: Slipknot - Day of the Gusano
programme.desc: After more than a decade of patiently waiting, the Mexican Maggots finally welcome the most anticipated visit of Slipknot and Knotfest to Mexico. On December 8th, 2015, Knotfest took over Mexico City for the experience of a lifetime. The most passionate, powerful, dedicated and loud Maggots on Earth attended in hordes to witness in action their most inspirational figures: the 9 members of Slipknot. The band did not disappoint. This show will leave you speechless and craving more. The intensity of Slipknot and the love they have for their fans is palpable. The wait was well worth it.

programme.title: Yes - Songs From Tsongas 35th Anniversary

programme.title: Prince - The Unauthorized Biography
programme.desc: Documentary focusing on the legendary musicians life and work, from his troubled childhood in Minneapolis to becoming one of the most popular and innovative artists in contemporary music.

programme.title: Robbie Williams - Live at the Apple Music Festival
programme.desc: A brand new show that brings a veteran artist at his best! The talented artist, who became famous in the group ""Take That"", lacks presentations, but he himself begins his show by saying: ""Let me resubmit ..."". Robbie Williams has the ability to reinvent himself, exhibiting so much energy that he seems to be a rookie artist. Already in the 40s band of pop music, Robbie is more than an artist consecrated worldwide, is a reference with hits present in the best lists of consecrated DJs. This show at the Roundhouse coincided with the announcement of their 11th solo album, Heavy Entertainment Show, just released. The new albums title reflects Williams performance as energy-dense as his 11-member big band, including his hits partner Guy Chambers on the piano. A formidable 90 minute pop odyssey. Mixing tracks from his Take That era, old or new, his songs allow him to reclaim his throne from an artist who dominates the stage - in fact, there is no one in pop music who combines his monumental energy with music Touching. A magical moment can be perceived in ""A Better Man"", only with the guitar on stage; Proof that he is an artist that goes beyond the scenery. This Blu-Ray shows the trajectory of an artist who knows how to renew himself every lap; An example for the new generations of music that are lost in appearance, forgetting the essential aspect that Robbie Williams is revealing more and more.

programme.title: Beyonce - Sound of Change
programme.desc: The Sound Of Change was a benefit concert held at Twickenham Stadium, London, England, as part of the Chime For Change initiative, founded by Beyonce with the help of actress Salma Hayek and Guccis creative director, Frida Giannini.

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Janis Joplin was one of the most successful and widely-known female rock stars of her era. After releasing three albums, she died of a heroin overdose at the age of 27. Her fourth album, Pearl, was released in January 1971, just over three months after her death. It reached number one on the Billboard charts. Her Legacy. The big-voiced, bluesy singer dominated the stage, forged her own path and paved the way for the female singers who followed.

programme.title: Limp Bizkit - Live at Reading Festival
programme.desc: The Reading Festival are a pair of annual rock music festivals that take place in Reading and Leeds in England. The events take place simultaneously on the Friday, Saturday and Sunday of the August bank holiday weekend, sharing the same bill.

programme.title: Fall Out Boy _ Boys of Zummer
programme.sub-title: Fall Out Boy _ Boys of Zummer: Live In Chicago
programme.desc: Join Multi-platinum selling artist Fall Out Boy as they travel back to their hometown of Chicago for a mind-blowing audio and visual extravaganza that will change your concept of what a rock concert should be! Featuring their newest hits Centuries, Irresistible and Uma Thurman, this 70 minute, 17 song concert also includes American Beauty/American Psycho; Sugar, Were Goin Down; Dance, Dance; This Aint a Scene, Its an Arms Race; Thnks fr th Mmrs and My Songs Know What You Did in the Dark (Light Em Up). This special performance will go down in history as one of the most memorable concerts from Fall Out Boys career, filmed during the Boys of Zummer tour that spanned over 39 cities throughout 2015. With stunning video walls containing dynamic visual content, great musicianship, and powerful songs all make for an unforgettable concert experience!

programme.desc: Need olid George Michaeli kaks viimast kontserti Londoni Ears Courti laval, 24. ja 25. augustil 2008, osana tema tuurist 25 Live. Laule jatkus tema pika karjaari igalt etapilt.

programme.title: Tom Petty and The Heartbreakers - Live at Soundstage
programme.desc: Filmed live from the Vic Theatre, Chicago, Illinois, USA in April 2003 for the "Soundstage" TV series.

programme.title: God Bless Ozzy Osbourne
programme.desc: Ozzy Osbourne is one of the most iconic figures in rock and one of the founding fathers of heavy metal. ""God Bless Ozzy Osbourne"" tells for the first time the story of his career from the founding of Black Sabbath through to solo stardom and his wider fame beyond. These were the wild days of his prodigious drug and alcohol intake, of biting the head from a dove at a record company meeting and biting into a bat on stage but also of the tragic death of Randy Rhoads and the reality TV show The Osbournes. The film follows Ozzys torturous and emotionally fraught journey from excess to sobriety, which Ozzy regards as his greatest accomplishment. Featuring never before seen footage, new interviews with Ozzy himself, his family, his bandmates, and those who both inspired him and were inspired by him, this is the first film to take viewers inside the mind and psyche of this legendary figure.

programme.title: Beck - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe met in a record store in West London. Although they came from different backgrounds they bonded over a love of electronic music. "Hague" their debut album "Please" was released in 1986, it entered the top 10 around the world. In 2013 the band released "Electric", which after the mellow Elysium saw them return to their dance roots, 30 years into their career the Pet Shop Boys remain top of the charts. Featuring archive material, music videos "Vocal", "Love etc".and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists Michael Bonner (Uncut Magazine), Hamish MacBain (Shortlist), John Aizlewood (Evening Standard)

programme.desc: Rihanna performs in Philadelphia in 2016, on the first day of the Made in America Festival. Rihanna was the main attraction of the festival, sampling from her Anti World Tour album as well as her older hits.

programme.title: Charlie Puth _ Live in London
programme.desc: Charlie Puth performs during the 2015 Apple Music Festival at The Roundhouse on September 20, 2015 in London, England.

programme.title: Jack Johnson - Main Square Festival
programme.desc: Watch the performance of Jack Johnson at the Main Square Festival, in Arras, France in 2014.

programme.title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti: Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: The Offspring - Rock AM
programme.desc: The Offspring is an American rock band from Garden Grove, California, formed in 1984. Originally formed under the name Manic Subsidal, the bands lineup consists of lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist Bryan "Dexter" Holland, bassist Todd Morse and lead guitarist Kevin "Noodles" Wasserman.

programme.title: Foals - A Session With Foals
programme.desc: Being from the rain-ridden lands of England, Foals are used to a different kind of festival environment: generally speaking, frontman Yannis Philippakis described them as "mud and wellies" ordeals. So were sure they were quite pleased to travel halfway around the world to the California desert to perform for Coachellas music-hungry crowds. Prior to taking to the stage in Indio, however, Foals made a pit stop at our little poolside bungalow to perform a Festival Fever Session featuring songs off their highly-acclaimed, recent full-length Holy Fire. While you might have already seen the bands in-the-flesh transformation of "My Number" into a slow-burning beaut, weve expanded the session to include the subtle closer "Moon".

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Motley Crue _ The End
programme.sub-title: Motley Crue _ The End: Live In Los Angeles
programme.desc: On January 28, 2014, Motley Crue held a press conference at Beachers Madhouse Theater in Hollywood, where they announced a final tour. The band became the first to sign a binding legal document known as a "cessation of touring" contract, preventing them from touring under the name Motley Crue past the year 2015. The tour eventually ended with three nights at the Staples Center in the bands hometown of Los Angeles on December 28, 30 and 31st of 2015. The visually stunning and final concert of Motley Crues final tour, Motley Crue: The End was captured with 30 cameras in Ultra HD 4K in front of a sold out crowd of die hard Motley Crue fans. For all of the legion of fans who were not able to experience the final concert of one of the greatest rock bands of all time, this is the ultimate chance to see the show and relive the final tour of Motley Crue.

programme.title: Milky Chance - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The German duet is back and better than ever! Milky Chance is the success story of two school friends, Clemens Rehbein and Philipp Dausch. After a long break, 2017 marks the release of a second, long-waited, album ""Blossom"". And, for the public, finally the occasion to discover live these new compositions, mixing rock, folk and electro pop. With reggae vibrations that can rub shoulders with house elements, Milky Chance has one of the most singular sounds. With the presence of musicians on stage, and if we believe the listening of the new record, we can expect more electric concerts, more electronic and even more energetic than in the past!

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: Justin Timberlake _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Justin Timberlake featuring unforgettable version of his hits: Sexyback, Cry Me a River, Suit and tie and many more.

programme.title: Cabin In the Woods
programme.desc: A young woman cosies up with her new boyfriend at his remote cabin. When he reveals his violent side, she must fight to survive.

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: Coming from the beautiful environs of Lake Erie, straddling the border between the US and Canada, this true life crime show focuses on the more sinister and gruesome tales of some of the regions darkest and deadliest crimes. We explore baffling and mysterious murder cases such as that of the 1989 kidnapping and murder of 10-year-old Amy Mihaljevic which provoked much speculation and intrigue in the area and which is still an open case. Each hourlong episode delves into the case history, analyzes the facts and evidence and carefully examines the detection procedures and how each suspect was cleared of suspicion. Subsequent episodes detail four additional deadly crimes that were solved by local law enforcement.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.sub-title: Mom Lured Me Into A Trap
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin

programme.title: Kadunud
programme.sub-title: The Most Hated Woman in America
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: True Conviction crime series is based on homicide cases from real life. The series explores how these cases are solved on the street and won in the courtroom. It is hosted by Anna-Sigga Nicolazzi, a decorated Brooklyn prosecutor who has never lost a murder case. She travels across the country to check how the nations top prosecutors handle their toughest cases and meets with other key figures in the cases, including loved ones and investigators.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: When 32-year-old Adam Chase disappears in Ontario County, NY, it takes the tireless efforts of a private investigator to reveal the truth - and Adams tragic fate.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: A man vanishes from a small Idaho town, leaving a trail of strange clues and rumours. When his body is found, the truth is more shocking than anyone imagined.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: True crime documentary series examining the troubling task law enforcement officers have, as they scour murder crime scenes for potential clues and evidence that will help them identify the culprit. With dramatic reconstructions that paint a picture of the brutal killing, each episode focusses on a respective case, as detectives scramble to catch the killer. Every potential item of evidence is pieced together, hoping to complete the sinister puzzle and bring justice for the family and friends of the deceased. As they uncover more about the victims, the detectives learn of their dark and mysterious secrets.

programme.sub-title: The Twelve Signs He Will Die
programme.desc: A copycat Zodiac killer terrorises New York City while keeping cops guessing his identity. It falls to veteran NYPD detectives to outwit him.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: No one knows how many victims a serial killer targeting hunters has killed. With the next hunting season looming, they must find the madman.

programme.title: Perfektne mõrv
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of the Persian Violet
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. Dead ends wont deter the team, when a seemingly impossible case lands on their desks, they always find a way in the end.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: Dark, mysterious, unforgiving, foreboding. These are not just words that describe our planets vast bodies of water, but also the killers who commit murder out on the open seas. In this true-crime documentary series, we investigate harrowing killings committed on water, where rage and fury have bubbled to the surface in vicious frenzies. We unearth tales of sobering horror, where friends, partners, husbands and relatives unrecognisably transform into brutal and frightening characters. From newlyweds on a remote island with nowhere to hide to the murderous brother of an NBA star, we document these savage killings that took place in the deep, dark waters.

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: Dark, mysterious, unforgiving, foreboding. These are not just words that describe our planets vast bodies of water, but also the killers who commit murder out on the open seas. From newlyweds on a remote island with nowhere to hide to the murderous brother of an NBA star, we document these savage killings that took place in the deep, dark waters.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A car accident gets a quiet neighbourhood talking, things get physical outside a gym, and police deal with a naked man who has turned violent.

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A burglar cries for help, a famous swan almost gets away, a bizarre heist mystifies local officials, and a stolen ambulance puts lives in danger.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A rageful driver crashes into a building. New Jersey drivers try to survive their commute. An angry man picks a fight with a scooter.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: Truckers fight off angry drivers. A boy fights for his life against an enraged motorist. A furious woman chases down another driver.

programme.title: Mõrva kõned
programme.desc: Murder Calls is a true-crime documentary series that explores the importance of the 911 calls made to the emergency services. Each episode features the chilling calls themselves, as detectives and investigators use the given information to help them track, trace and identify the potential killers. Using extensive reenactments, Murder Calls recreates aspects of the haunting murders, showing the twists and turns detectives face as they aim to understand the motive and identify the culprits. As with many murder cases, nothing at first is what it seems.

programme.title: Feuds Turned Fatal
programme.desc: When marital infidelity sparks resentment between two cousins, tempers flare. Betrayal and jealousy ignite a bitter feud that ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.sub-title: The Twelve Signs He Will Die
programme.desc: A copycat Zodiac killer terrorises New York City while keeping cops guessing his identity. It falls to veteran NYPD detectives to outwit him.

programme.title: Before They Kill Again
programme.desc: No one knows how many victims a serial killer targeting hunters has killed. With the next hunting season looming, they must find the madman.

programme.title: Perfektne mõrv
programme.sub-title: The Curious Case of the Persian Violet
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. Dead ends wont deter the team, when a seemingly impossible case lands on their desks, they always find a way in the end.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: No matter how far you run, or how much time passes, you cant escape your past. And for those who shared a life with an individual who became a killer, the past will always weigh heavy on their mind. This true-crime documentary series interviews loved ones of murderers to understand the impact and emotional turmoil that lingers over their life. In one act of violence, their lives would be changed forever.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Following Roo Powell, a 38-year-old child advocate, and her team at non-profit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) as they conduct an undercover operation to identify and stop adult predators who use the internet to harm the most vulnerable. With the help of her team, Roo transforms into a teen to reveal the identities of the men who reach out to her.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: To catch a killer, you have to think like a killer. In this true-crime documentary series, a team of dedicated experts led by detective Mike Arntfield attempt to solve murder cases that have gone cold, bringing closure to victims families. By re-enacting the crimes, uncovering new evidence, talking with friends and family members, and using 21st century technology, the team of passionate investigators hunt down every lead in order to solve the case.

programme.title: Viimane buss
programme.desc: Sudantsoojendav lugu pensionar Tomist (Timothy Spall, "Ava oma silmad"), kelle naine Mary on veidi aega tagasi elavate seast lahkunud. Mees otsustab reisida Inglismaa põhjatipust lõunatippu, mis oli ta kunagine kodupaik. Reisimiseks kasutab ta busse ja oma pensionari tasuta bussikaarti. Tema teekonda hakkavad jaadvustama inimesed, kellega ta reisi valtel kohtub. Nii saab sudamlikust ja heatahtlikust Tomist tema enese teadmata sotsiaalmeediastaar.

programme.title: Meistriklass
programme.desc: Meistriklassis jagavad oma teadmisi ja kogemusi kohalikud oma ala tipud. Nad tutvustavad varskeid ja kaasahaaravaid vaatenurki ning demonstreerivad tehnikaid, millega ala harrastajad võib-olla varem kokku puutunud pole. Peamiseks eesmargiks on publikut inspireerida ja julgustada neid tegutsema.

programme.title: Meistriklass
programme.desc: Meistriklassis jagavad oma teadmisi ja kogemusi kohalikud oma ala tipud. Nad tutvustavad varskeid ja kaasahaaravaid vaatenurki ning demonstreerivad tehnikaid, millega ala harrastajad võib-olla varem kokku puutunud pole. Peamiseks eesmargiks on publikut inspireerida ja julgustada neid tegutsema.

programme.title: Maaratud ellujaaja
programme.desc: Kui president Kirkman ja tema meeskond saavad usaldusvaarset luureinfot, et USA pinnale on jõudnud rapane pomm, palub Emily Chuckilt abi millegagi, millel on ohtlikud ja ebaseaduslikud tagajarjed.

programme.title: Tumeaine
programme.desc: Adrieni sõber langeb vangi Tabori rivaali katte, kes nõuab neiu vabastamise eest konkreetset andmefaili. Kui meeskond avastab, et fail sisaldab infot Ferrouse salajase sõjalaevastiku kohta, nõustuvad nad aitama. Seda muidugi tingimusel, et Raza meeskond saab faili endale. Probleem on vaid selles, et Adrian pole kindel, kuhu Tabor faili peitis.

programme.title: Kollanokk
programme.desc: Nolani ja Bailey mesinadalatest saab unelmate puhkuse asemel tõeline õudusunenagu, kui nad satuvad kuriteopaiga keskele. Tim ja Celina teevad koostood tundmatu mehe isiku tuvastamiseks.

programme.title: Optibet Eesti-Lati Korvpalliliiga
programme.sub-title: Tartu Ülikool Maks and Moorits vs Zelli Riia
programme.desc: Tartu Ülikool Maks and Moorits vs Zelli Riia

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Endine profigolfar leitakse turniiri ajal golfivaljakult surnuna paev parast seda, kui tema võõrdunud poeg tegi golfirajal rekordi.

programme.title: Lund ei saja enam kunagi
programme.desc: Auhinnatud draamakomoodia, mis valmis Poola-Saksa uhistoona. Film kandideeris Veneetsia filmifestivalil Kuldlõvile. Zhenia on vene keelt kõnelev Ukraina immigrant, kes asub jõuka Poola kogukonna juures toole massoorina. Kuigi tema kliendid on rikkad, valitseb nende hinges tuhjus ja kurbus. Mustilise uustulnuka kaed toovad tervist, kuid tema silmad naikse nende sudant puudutavat. Peagi on Zheniast saanud guru ning klientidest tema jargijad…

programme.title: Viimane nagu
programme.desc: Draama, mille lavastas Sean Penn ("Tagasi looduse ruppe") ja mis kandideeris Cannesis Kuldsele Palmioksale. Wren (Charlize Theron, "Mad max: Reavu tee") tootab Aafrikas tervishoiuaktivistina, jatkates oma isa kunagi alustatud missiooni. Ta tutvub Migueli-nimelise arstiga (Javier Bardem, "Ei ole maad vanadele meestele"), kes on end samuti puhendanud inimeste aitamisele sõdadest rasitud arengumaades. Nad armuvad teineteisesse, kuid pingelised olud keset rahvarahutusi panevad nende armastuse proovile…

programme.title: Karl Fredrik Österlenis
programme.desc: Hooaja finaal. Sugis on jõudnud Österleni ja samuti aeg koogiaed kokku pakkida. Karl Fredrik loob suure kimbu, valmistab kudooniamarmelaadi ja joob kohvi koos pakapikk Torvaldiga. Samuti valmib Rootsi kõrgeim kõrvitsatorn!

programme.title: Maaratud ellujaaja
programme.desc: Surmava plahvatuse jarel kuulutab president Kirkman sõja Kunamile; Hannah Wells avastab, et Kunami suursaadik varjab midagi, millel võivad olla tapvad tagajarjed.

programme.title: Tumeaine
programme.desc: Paralleeluniversumi Raza meeskond (Portia, Boone, Tash, Wexler ja Teine Android) varastavad Ishida ristleja ja reedavad komandor Truffault. Kui siinne Raza meeskond sellest teada saab, otsustavad nad oma teisikutega tegeleda. Nad kasutavad Adriani vahendajana ja panevad paika lihtsa lõksu, kuid nende teisikutel on mõtteis midagi muud.

programme.title: Kollanokk
programme.desc: Thorsen naaseb runnakujargselt toole ning talle maaratakse lahendamiseks stressirohkeid juhtumeid, kontrollimaks tema valmisolekut tool tagasi olla. Samal ajal uurivad teised mõrvajuhtumit, mis võib olla seotud Pentagrammi Tapjaga.

programme.title: Tere tulemast Rootsi
programme.desc: Bruce on tagasi New Yorgis, et aidata hadas olevat endist klienti (Amy Poehler). Emma on tõrges, sest eks viibib tema korteris. Viveka tahab vanu haid aegu meenutada ja minna Emmaga linna peale pidutsema.

programme.title: Tere tulemast Rootsi
programme.desc: Bruce avastab end Aubrey Plaza kate vahelt. Emma ja Gustaf teevad kõik endast oleneva, et vanemaid taas kokku viia. Brucei teed tagasi Rootsi saadavad mitmed takistused.

programme.title: Leekide laht
programme.desc: Peale palgamõrtsuka sihtmargiks saamist ning napilt surma suust paasemist peab suurfirma juht Stella Heikkinen minema pakku vaikesesse Tasmaania kulasse, kus kohalikud on tema saabumise osas kahtleval seisukohal.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Üks keskkooliõpilane on surnud, teine kadunud. Kriminalistid avastavad end uurimas kiirendusvõistlust ja surmavat rivaalitsemist.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Advokaat Matt Murdock (Ben Affleck) kaotas lapsena oma nagemise. Sellest saadik on ta treeninud oma teisi meeli ja suudab "naha" enamat, kui tavaline inimene silmadega. Mees, kes uritab paevasel ajal kohtusaalis õiglust jalule seada kostumeerib end oositi maskeeritud võitlejaks Daredevil, kes ei pea õnneks kohtureeglitest kinni pidama ja uritab sedasi kuritegevust piirata. Peagi kohtub ta kahe vaenlasega, kes end niisama lihtsalt võita ei lase: New Yorki allilma valitseja Wilson Fisk (Michael Clarke Duncan), huudnimega Kingpin ja Bullseye (Colin Farrell) - tapja kes suudab pea iga eseme surmavaks viskerelvaks muuta. Film põhineb aastal 1964 Stan Lee ja Bill Evertti poolt loodud legendaarsel Marveli koomiksikangelasel.

programme.title: Ellen Colei viimane võitlus
programme.desc: Õelal ja ahnel ettevõtjal on kasil suur ehitusprojekt ja ta kasutab aarmuslikke meetmeid, et tõsta kodust valja vana haige Ellen, kes ei nõustu mitte mingi hinna eest talle oma maja ja maad muuma. Pealtnaha ohutu vana naine on tegelikkuses treenitud palgamõrvar, kes ei loo risti ette mitte millegi ees, et enda armsat elukohta kaitsta.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Barnes on salajasel missioonil, et tabada ambitsioonikas gangijuht, kes kavandab oma võimu suurendamiseks veresaunu ule terve Bronxi linnaosa.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Vallavanem kohtub salaparase Kaidoga, kes tahaks ehitada tselluloositehast. Loomulikult loob selline suurejooneline mõte Paavli peas lambikese põlema ja soostab huvides tegutsema. Kerepa avastab enda sarnasuse Põhja-Koera diktaatoriga ning hakkab mõtlema, mis oleks, kui tema polekski lihtsalt Kerepa. Kirikuõpetaja otsustab teenida lisaraha tšakrate avamisega, kuid tšakrad avanevad hoopis ootamatust kohast.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Suureparase valjaõppe saanud tapja kuulutab sõja Chicago politseijaoskonnale.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim politseisaade toob vaatajateni olulisemad krimiuudised. Uudiseid elu pahupoolelt vahendab saatejuht Taavi Otsus.

programme.title: Minu kodu on parim
programme.desc: Võistluses on kuus paari, kes hakkavad unelmate auhinna nimel uksteise maju renoveerima. Igal tiimil on oma eelarve ja neile maaratakse konkreetne osa kaasvõistleja kodust ning aiast, mis tuleb võimalikult agedaks ja stiilseks muuta. Kuna selleks ettenahtud aeg on piiratud, seisavad võistlevad paarid silmitsi karmide valjakutsetega – lisaks lennukale fantaasiale ja kuldsetele katele paneb see proovile ka nende omavahelised suhted, sest pinge all kipuvad emotsioonid kontrolli alt valjuma. Esimesena võetakse kasile Jemma ja Beni ligi 70 aastat tagasi ehitatud maja.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Taistund
programme.desc: Ajakirjanduslik paevakajasaade toob vaatajateni põhjalikult uuritud ja inimlahedased lood nii Eestist kui ka mujalt maailmast. Ajakirjanikud Elo Mõttus-Leppik, Sander Punamae, Mart Mardisalu, Neeme Raud, Raul Ranne ja Madis Kimmel kasitlevad uhiskonnas olulisi teemasid, mis tekitavad sageli laiemat diskussiooni ja aitavad esile tõsta lahendamist vajavad probleemid. Lisaks aktuaalsetele kusimustele avardab Taistund ka vaataja silmaringi, pakkudes sugavamaid arusaamu meid umbritsevast maailmast.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Cash teeb rutaka otsuse. Carl põhjustab probleeme. Tanel on rohkem kaotada, kui ta oleks osanud arvata.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monk peab lisaks rahapesu uurimisele ka kapteni abieluprobleemidesse sekkuma.

programme.title: Magipaastjad
programme.desc: 14-aastane Leni matkab koos isa Kaiga magimajja, kus ema juba ees ootab. Ema teatab Lenile, et soovib too tõttu kogu perega Keeniasse kolida. Leni vihastab ja lahkub magimajast. Temaga juhtub õnnetus. Markus ja Tobi uritavad tudrukut leida. Carola seisund halveneb. Ta palub Markusel lapsendada oma tutar Mia. Markus ei taha sellest aga kuuldagi.

programme.title: Saatuslik kiri
programme.desc: Alanur ja Beste lahevad tagasi koju. Hatice assitab Mina Asli vastu veel rohkem ules. Mina sõnad ja teod teevad Aslile haiget. Kui Alanur saab teada, et Mahmut teab tõde selle kohta, et Ziya on Beste isa, otsustab ta Bestele kõik ara raakida. Bestel on raske uue teadmisega toime tulla. Ziya lubab Nevzati elu raskeks teha.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Marie tegeleb looduskatastroofi tagajargede likvideerimisega, aga tanusõnade asemel kuuleb vaid suudistusi. Peale kõige muu peab ta hakkama saama ka oma tunnetega, sest armukadedus narib teda aina tugevamini. Max teatab Mariele oma otsusest.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Vallavanemal on vaja vallamajas võimu haaranud Kerepa vastu komprat koguda ja ta otsustab mehe ahistamisskandaali massida. Samal ajal ahvardavad aga nii Mihhailova kui Vallavanema enda naine varjupaika kolida, kui mehed nendega rohkem arvestama ei hakka. Spioonimangu alustanud mehed vajavad lõpuks ise kaitset, sest lukkasid kaima võimsa lumepalli, mis Esna naised oma õiguste eest seisma pani.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Kodud rahaks
programme.desc: Saatejuht Keili Sukijainen ja sisekujundusentusiast Merlin Miido on taas Hispaanias, kus nende abi ootab imelise vaatega korter Hispaania paikeserannikul Benalmadenas. Kui rõdult toa poole vaadata, ununeb kaunis merevaade ruttu, sest silma hakkab hairima sisustus, mis kuidagi uurnikke ei meelita. Remondivaljakutse võtab vastu Reijo, kelle kavalad muiged panevad Merlini korduvalt kahtlema, kas kõik valmib ikka nii nagu ta seda oma vaimusilmas ette on kujutanud.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.title: Ja nii ongi?
programme.desc: Hooaja viimases saates kusime, kas nii ongi, et origami abil saame lastele paremini matemaatikat õpetada, oma silmi ja kõrvu ei saa alati uskuda ja looduslik valik hakkab ka inimkonnas selekteerima kui me targemaid valikuid tegema ei hakka?

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Suureparase valjaõppe saanud tapja kuulutab sõja Chicago politseijaoskonnale.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: PTSDd põdev veteran kaotab parast relvavenna surma taielikult enesevalitsuse. Meeskond peab endast kõik andma, et teda peatada.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.desc: Suureparase valjaõppe saanud tapja kuulutab sõja Chicago politseijaoskonnale.

programme.title: Minu kodu on parim
programme.desc: Võistluses on kuus paari, kes hakkavad unelmate auhinna nimel uksteise maju renoveerima. Igal tiimil on oma eelarve ja neile maaratakse konkreetne osa kaasvõistleja kodust ning aiast, mis tuleb võimalikult agedaks ja stiilseks muuta. Kuna selleks ettenahtud aeg on piiratud, seisavad võistlevad paarid silmitsi karmide valjakutsetega – lisaks lennukale fantaasiale ja kuldsetele katele paneb see proovile ka nende omavahelised suhted, sest pinge all kipuvad emotsioonid kontrolli alt valjuma. Esimesena võetakse kasile Jemma ja Beni ligi 70 aastat tagasi ehitatud maja.

programme.title: Ja nii ongi?
programme.desc: Hooaja viimases saates kusime, kas nii ongi, et origami abil saame lastele paremini matemaatikat õpetada, oma silmi ja kõrvu ei saa alati uskuda ja looduslik valik hakkab ka inimkonnas selekteerima kui me targemaid valikuid tegema ei hakka?

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Tane seisab tõsise valiku ees. Harper klammerdub Tane sõnade kulge. Eden ravib oma murtud sudant.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monk lahendab suurt teemandiroovi.

programme.title: Magipaastjad
programme.desc: 14-aastane Leni matkab koos isa Kaiga magimajja, kus ema juba ees ootab. Ema teatab Lenile, et soovib too tõttu kogu perega Keeniasse kolida. Leni vihastab ja lahkub magimajast. programme.title: Saatuslik kiri
programme.desc: Ema peale solvunud Beste saabub Mahmuti poole. Seher teatab Ziyale, et ta ei ole abielulahutuse vastu ja palub tal laste eest hoolt kanda. Selcuki ja Mehmeti vahel puhkeb suur konflikt. Asli tunneb vajadust kodust mõneks ajaks lahkuda, kui naeb Minat ara minemas. Mehmet teeb otsuse seista Asli kõrval.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Stefan saab haiglast valja, kuid peab veel pikalt taastusravis kaima. Max teatab tallegi oma pommuuudise. Marie otsustab võtta oma komandosse noori pisisulisid, kes peavad tegema uhiskondliku too tunde. Nii satub Murnau komandosse kergelt autistlike kalduvustega Richard. Marie puuab raakida Stefaniga tulevikust. Stefan suudistab Mariet oma õnnetuses.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Mihhailova ahvardab Kirikuõpetajast lahutada, sest mees ei saa enam hakkama ei usuasjade ega ka majapidamisega, raakimata veel magamistoast. Kirikuõpetaja peab nuud olema eriti kõva mees, et naine tagasi võita. Samal ajal tahab Vallavanema naine Krista korraldada uhke kirikliku ja lausa kuningliku laulatuse, sest nad pandi vene ajal pereburoos paari, aga Jumala ees on nad endiselt vallalised.

programme.title: Vaprad ja moodsad
programme.desc: Moepere elus on kaos saavutanud haripunkti. Üurikorter tuleb ule anda ja kolida kolme lapsega ajutisele pinnale. Lisaks peab valmis saama viimased rõivakomplektid New Yorki moenadalaks ja valmistuma talvitumisreisiks Sri Lankal. Kõike tundub korraga olevat liiga palju.

programme.title: Õhtu!

programme.title: James May
programme.desc: Et kõik teed viivad alati Rooma, oli paratamatus, et ka James May jõuab lõpuks valja Itaalia vagevasse pealinna. Kuid ta ei piirdu seal ainult roomlaste ja varemetega, vaid istub ka bussile, kohtab teist versiooni iseendast ja uurib midagi, mis on liiga pisike, et seda nahagi.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Kui leitakse noore naise surnukeha, mõistab Chicago politsei võrreldes seda juhtumit teistega, et linnas tegutseb sarimõrvar.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Sektijuht põgeneb oma lahimate jungritega parast oma perekonna mõrva tellimist. Tagaajamise kaigus avastab Jess kolleegidega, et enne prohvetiks hakkamist oli mees tuntud suli.

programme.title: Erdogani impeerium
programme.desc: Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган - самый противоречивый президент в современной истории Турции. Его правление привело как к массовому повышению уровня жизни, так и к почти полному контролю над судебной системой и СМИ. Этот документальный фильм, снятый в преддверии всеобщих выборов в мае 2023 года, рассказывает о битвах, которые Эрдоган вел на своем пути к власти. В нем представлены захватывающие свидетельства из первых рук бывшего президента Абдуллы Гюля, бывших премьер-министров, партийных лидеров, деятелей оппозиции, аналитиков и журналистов. Многие полагают, что Эрдоган сделает все, чтобы остаться у власти.

programme.title: Erdogani impeerium
programme.desc: Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган - самый противоречивый президент в современной истории Турции. Его правление привело как к массовому повышению уровня жизни, так и к почти полному контролю над судебной системой и СМИ. В нем представлены захватывающие свидетельства из первых рук бывшего президента Абдуллы Гюля, бывших премьер-министров, партийных лидеров, деятелей оппозиции, аналитиков и журналистов.
